item.title: 特朗普的关税震荡给龙舌兰酒制造商带来了巨大冲击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对墨西哥的关税威胁时好时坏，让墨西哥标志性龙舌兰酒业的高管们头疼不已。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s on-again, off-again tariff threats against Mexico are giving executives in the country’s iconic tequila industry a splitting headache.】

item.title: 全球风险不断增加，股市面临 "不确定性迷雾

item.title: 塞内加尔因巨额债务修订被 S&P 下调信用评级
item.description: 在审计法庭发现塞内加尔前总统麦基-萨勒最后任期内的赤字比之前报告的要大之后，塞内加尔的信用评级被进一步下调为垃圾级。【原文：Senegal’s credit rating was cut further into junk after a court of auditors found that the country’s deficit during ex-President Macky Sall’s final term was bigger than previously reported.】

item.title: 越南总理秦呼吁为马斯克的 "星链 "发放许可证
item.description: 越南总理范明正敦促政府官员为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）卫星服务在这个东南亚国家开绿灯。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh urged officials to green-light Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite service in the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 美国试图对抗中国的海上霸权
item.description: 习近平主席喜欢把中国的 "屈辱世纪 "称为 "海上世纪"。在中国加入世界贸易组织的一个半世纪之前，英国人强迫中国以高度屈从的形式加入全球贸易体系。【原文：China’s “century of humiliation,” as President Xi Jinping likes to call it, arrived by sea, with foreign merchant vessels backed by naval assets. More than one and a half centuries before China joined the World Trade Organization, the British forced it into the global trading system in a highly subjugated form.】

item.title: 美国人对通胀的担忧加剧，有可能破坏经济软着陆
item.description: 越来越多的美国人开始预期物价将居高不下，甚至还会上涨；这对美联储及其多年来为抑制通货膨胀而进行的斗争来说是个坏兆头。【原文：A growing number of Americans are beginning to expect that prices will stay high, or even rise — a bad omen for the Federal Reserve and its years-long fight to stifle inflation.】

item.title: 绘制全球经济图表：美国经济增长的艰难开局
item.description: 今年年初，美国消费支出疲软，商品贸易逆差明显扩大，表明这个世界最大的经济体正在减速。【原文：US consumer spending weakened and the merchandise trade deficit widened markedly at the start of the year, pointing to a downshift in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 特斯拉延续年初颓势，法国销量下降 26
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）2 月份在法国的销售业绩再创多年来最差，延续了年初在欧洲最大电动汽车市场之一的低迷状态。【原文：Tesla Inc. followed up its worst sales month in years in France with another weak showing in February, prolonging its early-year slump in one of Europe’s biggest markets for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 香港长江基建据称将探讨竞购英国垃圾处理公司 Viridor
item.description: 据知情人士透露，长江基建控股有限公司正在考虑竞购 KKR & Co.支持的英国废物管理公司 Viridor Ltd.。【原文：CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. is considering a bid for KKR & Co.-backed UK waste management firm Viridor Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 法国新车注册量因斯特兰蒂斯销量下降而下降
item.description: 法国汽车协会（PFA）上周六公布的数据显示，由于Stellantis NV公司生产的汽车销量减少，2月份法国新车注册量同比下降了0.72%。【原文：French new car registrations fell 0.72% in February from a year ago, led by fewer sales of vehicles made by Stellantis NV, according to figures from the PFA auto association published on Saturday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 披露其人工智能模型的理论利润率为 545
item.description: 中国人工智能公司 DeepSeek 周六披露了一些财务数据，称其 "理论 "利润率可能超过成本的五倍，从而揭开了笼罩在人工智能行业商业模式上的一层神秘面纱。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence phenomenon DeepSeek revealed some financial numbers on Saturday, saying its “theoretical” profit margin could be more than five times costs, peeling back a layer of the secrecy that shrouds business models in the AI industry.】

item.title: 马来西亚最大养老基金提高 2024 年股息支付额
item.description: 马来西亚最大的养老基金宣布了七年来最高的股息率，并将成功归功于复苏的市场、有弹性的经济增长和稳健的投资组合管理。【原文：Malaysia’s largest pension fund declared its highest dividend rates in seven years, attributing the success to recovering markets, resilient economic growth and sound portfolio management.】

item.title: 里夫斯准备削减开支计划以遵守财政规则
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）正准备削减开支计划，并要求公共部门提高其糟糕的生产力水平，以弥补政府财政的漏洞。【原文：Rachel Reeves is preparing to cut back her spending plans and demand the public sector improves its woeful levels of productivity, as Britain’s Chancellor of the Exchequer tries to repair a hole in the government’s finances.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入超出预期，表明经济放缓趋势正在缓解
item.description: 澳门博彩业收入在 2 月份增长了 6.8%，超过了分析师的预期，这是一个初步迹象，表明拖累这个全球最大博彩中心的经济放缓趋势正在开始缓解。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 6.8% in February, exceeding analyst expectations, in a tentative sign that a slowdown that’s dragged on the world’s biggest gambling hub is starting to ease.】

item.title: 美联社称，联邦工作人员开始收到新邮件，以证明工作的正当性
item.description: 据美联社周五报道，美国联邦政府工作人员再次收到一封电子邮件，要求他们概述自己的成就，这一次还附带了每周一次的信息。【原文：US federal workers again have been receiving an email that demanded them to outline their accomplishments, this time with a message that it would be a weekly occurrence, the Associated Press reported on Friday.】

item.title: 施莱格尔表示，瑞士央行只会在必要时采取负利率政策
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，随着市场对借贷成本将降至零以下的预期减弱，瑞士国家银行只会在必要时重新引入负利率。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will only reintroduce negative interest rates if necessary, President Martin Schlegel said as market expectations that borrowing costs will go below zero fade.】

item.title: 据 Bernama 报道，芯片设计公司 Arm 将在马来西亚设立基地
item.description: 伯纳玛（Bernama）周五援引马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）的话报道称，Arm Holdings Plc 将于下周签署一项协议，在马来西亚建立基地。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc is set to sign a pact next week to establish a base in Malaysia, Bernama reported on Friday, citing Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动恢复扩张，但贸易风险加剧
item.description: 中国的工厂活动在 2 月份恢复扩张，这是经济在受到美国提高关税的打击和国内需求疲软的情况下恢复活力的一个迹象。【原文：China’s factory activity returned to expansion in February, a sign of resilience in an economy hit by higher US tariffs and suffering from weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁逼近，韩国出口萎缩
item.description: 韩国 2 月份出口萎缩，这对依赖贸易的韩国经济来说又是一个令人担忧的迹象，而此时，韩国官员正争先恐后地与美国接触，希望避免唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动带来的打击。【原文：South Korea’s exports contracted in February in another worrying sign for the trade-reliant economy at a time when officials are scrambling to engage the US in hopes of averting a hit from Donald Trump’s tariff campaign.】

item.title: 瑞安-雷诺兹的 MNTN 提交首次公开募股申请，显示收入增长
item.description: 由好莱坞明星瑞安-雷诺兹（Ryan Reynolds）担任首席创意官的联网电视广告平台 MNTN Inc.【原文：MNTN Inc., a connected TV advertising platform that counts Hollywood star Ryan Reynolds as its chief creative officer, filed for an initial public offering, showing revenue growth and narrowing losses.】

item.title: 最新经济数据加剧美国滞胀担忧
item.description: 美国最近的一系列数据显示通胀回升和经济活动放缓，这加剧了人们对这个世界最大经济体可能正走向滞胀时期的担忧。【原文：A string of recent US data showing resurgent inflation and slowing activity is stoking fears the world’s biggest economy could be heading toward a period of stagflation.】

item.title: 法官称拜州官员藏匿现金违反了对贷款人的义务
item.description: 根据美国法院周五的一项裁决，印度科技公司 Byju's 的一名高级官员违反了他对贷款人的信托责任，错误地向贷款人隐瞒了 5.33 亿美元的资金，这是债权人为收回拖欠的 12 亿美元贷款所取得的胜利。【原文：A top official of Indian tech firm Byju’s violated his fiduciary duty to lenders by wrongly hiding $533 million from them, according to a US court ruling Friday, a win for creditors vying to collect on a defaulted $1.2 billion loan.】

item.title: 债券大跌股票显示华尔街增长躁动加剧
item.description: 对于担心经济的人来说，最近的报告给了他们充分的理由去担心。消费者信心低迷、申请失业救济人数大幅飙升、住房数据黯淡等等。【原文：For anyone worried about the economy, recent reports gave ample reason to fret. Flailing consumer confidence, a big jump in jobless claims, gloomy housing data, and more.】

item.title: Big Lots 缺乏现金支付破产账单，激怒供应商
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，破产零售商 Big Lots Inc. 没有足够的资金向供应商支付在该零售商为避免数百家门店关闭而进行的努力失败期间所提供的所有商品的货款。【原文：Bankrupt retailer Big Lots Inc. doesn’t have enough money to pay suppliers for all the goods provided during the retailer’s failed effort to keep hundreds of stores from closing, according to people familiar with the situation.】
